<br>

The [Research Computing Group](https://www.rcg.sfu.ca){target="_blank"} at [Simon Fraser
University](https://www.sfu.ca){target="_blank"} offers **workshops, courses, and webinars in high-performance
research computing** for researchers at Canadian post-secondary institutions. We work in collaboration with
other universities from British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba under the umbrella of the
[Digital Research Alliance of Canada](https://alliancecan.ca){target="_blank"}.

<br>

If you want to get informed about upcoming courses and webinars, please join our mailing list below. We will
only email you about training events.
